document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">After </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Birds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">been </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">investigated </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">laid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">aside </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Nature </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">imparts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Blue </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Bird </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Assured </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">conscientious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">voice </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">soar </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">unmoved </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Above </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">ostensible </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">vicissitude </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">First </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">March </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Competing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Wind </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">zealous </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Note </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Delights </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#301034">ascend </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Last </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Scene </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">swerves </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Fortitude </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">flanked </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Melody. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: After all birds have been investigated
